description: Track personal or business transactions with ease. KhaataBook lets you manage multiple hisaabs with optional passcode protection and a delightful UI experience.

UTSAV is a modern, full-stack web application designed to streamline the planning, management, and participation of events in academic institutions and beyond. It provides a centralized platform for organizers and participants to engage seamlessly in events of all scales.
Designed a reimagined and interactive website using ReactJS, featuring GSAP animations and tailored UI/UX showcasing products and brand, to increase user engagement and timeon-site.

Built a role-based web platform that uses AI/ML to transform live camera feeds into actionable insights. Designed a modular dashboard with role-based access control for flexible service management. Reduced manual surveillance and attendance logging effort by up to 70%, significantly improving operational efficiency.
